msContents.summary: A volume containing fifteen separate documents, mostly orders (ḥukmnāmah) and consultations ofṬīpū Sulṭān. Several are in Ṭīpū’s hand, and almost every one contains annotations by Col.William Kirkpatrickinto whose hands they passed after the fall ofŚrīraṅgapaṭṭaṇa (India)in1799. The documents comprise:

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on U. Sims-Williams: Handlist of Islamic manuscripts acquired by the India Office Library 1938-85. London, 1986

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card for admissions procedures contactBritish Library, Registering for a Reader Pass). Contactapac-enquiries@bl.ukfor further information on the availability of this manuscript

msItem.author: Tipu Sultan, Fath ʻAli, Nawab of Mysore, 1753-1799طيپو سلطان، فتح على، نواب ميسور
msItem.title: Ḥukmnāmah ba-nām-i ʻāmilān va sarishtahdārān-i ḥāl va istiqbāl-i taʻalliqah-ʼi Sīlam
حكمنانه بنام ‏عاملان و سرشتهداران حال و استقبال تعلقۀ سیلم
msItem.note: Contains the seal ofṬīpū Sulṭān

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Sims-Williams 1986, page 5.

msItem.title: Consultations
msItem.note: Consultations, partly in his own hand, ofṬīpū Sulṭān of Mysorewith his ministers on Babr Jang’s jāgīr, the return of his two sons taken hostages, a proposed tour, the Mahdavis, and Shūndījī Vāgh

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Sims-Williams 1986, page 5-6.

لوازم گروۀ جات کامگاری قلعۀ دار السلطنت پنن

اقرارنامه

CopystMuḥammad Ḥabīb Allāh,محمدحبيب الله
